Title: The Retreat
Plot: The senators head to a Republican retreat at a Virginia plantation, where they're haunted by the ghosts of slavery, Ronald Reagan and their exes.  After a soul-cleansing bonfire with the housemates, Gil John awakes with a new fire in his belly.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Yara Martinez, Amy Sedaris, Julie White, Bradley Whitford, Natalie Gold, Willa Fitzgerald, Wendy Makkena, Janel Moloney, William Thomas Evans, Amy Rutberg, Jim Morris, Jack Halpin, Gary Leimkuhler
